title: MD
biography: Modernized Saudi drug regulation. Associated with Saudi FDAClinical Pharmacology.
aiSummary: Hisham Al Jadhey is a regulatory leadership awards specialist with an H-index of 36 at Saudi FDAClinical Pharmacology (Member). Has been published in BMJ Open, Therapeutic Innovation & Regulatory Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
